review: I love the speed but they need to make it easier to turn off apps and an option to turn fire tv off. It stayed on for an hour after i turned off the tv because an app was on.  Also amazon you have to have vudu on fire tv, flixsters non hd playback is a deal breaker if i had knowledge of this i would have bought roku.

review: The unit is exceptionally easy to install, the voice activated remote is awesome and is smart enough to understand accents! The one downside is that u need multiple units if u have more than one t.v. In your house, also a large number of movies that u can get at redbox for a dollar are a lot more expensive on amazon streaming

review: If you don't have Amazon Instant Video then you may not like this. Netflix, etc. are buried in the menu and options. Also voice feature only works with Amazon Instant.....and that's not made clear in all their hype. Video performance is very good and remote is user friendly although it would be nice if it was back lighted..
